channel.title: R on Sophia Baca
channel.description: Recent content in R on Sophia Baca

item.title: Renewable Energy Momentum Index
item.description: Which nations offer the most attractive environment for renewable energy investments? To answer this question, my teammates and I created the Renewable Energy Momentum Index, a quantitative score encompassing each country’s market potential and receptivity to renewable energy.

item.title: RNA-Seq Analysis for Rice
item.description: I performed data analysis for a research paper wherein we were interested in studying time series RNA-Seq data for rice. My fellow developers and I created a data analysis pipeline for the RNA-Seq data wherein we identified differentially expressed genes (DEGs) and described their gene ontology (cellular component, molecular function, biological process).

item.title: Train Accidents in the U.S.
